N o t e: Among the Turkish material there are few specimens, both females and males, with one CSM, therefore T. unicubitalis has to be considered only individual variations without any taxonomical meaning.
D i s t r i b u t i o n i n T u r k e y: Bitlis ( MADL 1997 ).
D i s t r i b u t i o n i n t h e w o r l d: Europe and Turkey .
